title: BMetal(R)evo FREE Watch Face
summary: Analog watchface with 5 bright, 4 dimmed colors, events, weather, stepcounter
description: This is a WatchMaker design and so the free WatchMaker App must be installed onto your device before installing this watch face. WatchMaker can be found here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfYThis is free version of Darkle BlackMetal (R)evolution watchface.Bright mode options :- Time- Day- Date- Month- Weather- Step counter- Watch battery reading - Phone battery reading (if battery reading is < 25 then text changing to red)- Watch and Phone battery led lights (going green->yellow->red)- Sunrise and sunset times (sun moving at the edge of the watch sunrise to sunset)- 5 different color choices (colorset button)- calendar events (with tilted display)- clockhands,texts and watchdetails animations- Optimized images, indexed colors, pngslim packed (for better battery life)Dimmed mode options :- 4 different color choices- 5 different brightness options- pixel grid, which can be enabled or disabled (default is enabled)- 12 or 24 hours mode option (default is 12h)- You can choose whether to show the digital clock, analog clock, or both- animations
descriptionHTML:
This is a WatchMaker design and so the free WatchMaker App must be installed onto your device before installing this watch face. WatchMaker can be found here: http://goo.gl/FMxUfY

This is free version of Darkle BlackMetal (R)evolution watchface.

Bright mode options :

- Time
- Day
- Date
- Month
- Weather
- Step counter
- Watch battery reading
- Phone battery reading (if battery reading is < 25 then text changing to red)
- Watch and Phone battery led lights (going green->yellow->red)
- Sunrise and sunset times (sun moving at the edge of the watch sunrise to sunset)
- 5 different color choices (colorset button)
- calendar events (with tilted display)
- clockhands,texts and watchdetails animations
- Optimized images, indexed colors, pngslim packed (for better battery life)

Dimmed mode options :

- 4 different color choices
- 5 different brightness options
- pixel grid, which can be enabled or disabled (default is enabled)
- 12 or 24 hours mode option (default is 12h)
- You can choose whether to show the digital clock, analog clock, or both
- animations
